statements: SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, payment_amount FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE book_id = 5;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT author_id, royalty_rate FROM authors WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT author_name, royalty_rate FROM authors WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE book_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT author_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM authors GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_payment DESC
SELECT author_name, payment_amount, royalty_rate FROM authors WHERE royalty_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors WHERE LENGTH(author_name) > 10
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, book_id, author_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM book_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT author_name, sale_amount FROM authors JOIN book_sales ON authors.author_id = book_sales.author_id WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_id FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT author_id, COUNT(author_id) AS total_sales FROM book_sales GROUP BY author_id HAVING total_sales > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY book_title DESC;
SELECT author_name, book_title, sales_count FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id;
SELECT author_name, payment_amount FROM authors JOIN payments ON authors.author_id = payments.author_id WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, book_title FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id;
SELECT author_name, payment_amount FROM authors JOIN payments ON authors.author_id = payments.author_id WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT author_name, book_title, sales_count FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id WHERE sales_count < 1000;
SELECT author_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM authors JOIN payments ON authors.author_id = payments.author_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM books WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors;
SELECT book_title, publication_date, author_id FROM books WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, amount FROM sales WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT author_id, author_name, b.book_title, s.sale_date FROM authors a JOIN books b ON a.author_id = b.author_id JOIN sales s ON b.book_id = s.book_id;
SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_date, s.sale_id, s.amount FROM payments p JOIN sales s ON p.sale_id = s.sale_id WHERE p.amount > s.amount
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM Authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, author_id FROM Books WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales;
SELECT author_name, payment_amount FROM Authors JOIN Payments ON Authors.author_id = Payments.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM Authors JOIN Books ON Authors.author_id = Books.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT book_title, sale_date, quantity FROM Books JOIN Sales ON Books.book_id = Sales.book_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, SUM(royalty_amount) AS total_royalties FROM Authors JOIN Royalties ON Authors.author_id = Royalties.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
